Articles.Content:
Well, I was looking at the Vogelspin plane\'s thread and said to myself, why not build your own Ant plane?

So here it is.

It flys well, has ASAS on it and 3 fuel tanks (may add more).

It also has 4 parachutes in case of exploding engine or all the wings fell off emergencies. There are landing gears on every wind because the wings\'ll hit the pavement when going off the runway. Uses swept wings to imitate an ant\'s legs.

EDIT:

I\'ve added a screenshot of how the wing landing gear works when the plane drives off the runway.
